name: Lords Coin
description:
LORDS COIN is a polygon blockchain-based crypto currency that also serves as a strong foundation for a myriad of decentralized infrastructures, consisting of investment solutions. There are currently four projects associated with LORDS COIN which are as follows: 

 

•  Wallet

•  KYC free Payment card

•  Blockchain

•  Exchange

 

On the POLYGON blockchain network, LORDS COIN functions as a utility token as well as an asset token for this decentralized network.
